name: .555 File Extension
summary: Learn about .555 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Properties file used by Black & White, a strategy game where players control villages as a god; stores settings for different weather system states, such as day, dusk, and night, as well as good and evil weather.

content: 555 files are used for displaying the weather associated with the time of day. They also are used to show whether the current game state is evil or good.
NOTE: Lionhead Studios Black & White has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
